fullDescription.intro: This layer crops the layer input in two dimensions. Corresponds to the Keras Cropping 2D Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: A tuple of two integers. How many units should be trimmed off at the beginning and end of the first spatial dimension.
A tuple of two integers. How many units should be trimmed off at the beginning and end of the second spatial dimension.

ul.li: channels_last: corresponds to inputs with shape (height, width, channels)
channels_first: corresponds to inputs with shape (channels, height, width)

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Cropping 2D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Cropping 2D layer.
